page.title: 06Marlowe House.
page.content: Marlowe House is a{17 storey}office block situated close to Sidcup Station.The site was carefully chosen to make{access easy into central {London.}Built in 1970 by Balfour Beatty Construction Company (who have offices on the top floor) it has{ {extensive car parking space. As well as a large cleaning staff there is a{resident caretaker}living in a flat on the ground floor. The building has stairs as well as{large {lifts;}fire regulations require emergency stairs as well as regular fire drills. The whole building is{air {conditioned}as it gets hot due to the large windows attracting heat. {Marlowe Rooms}is an adjacent building providing{catering facilities as well as a dance hall for special functions.Christopher House is a small office block next to Marlowe Rooms.
